DOC.brief_title: Fluocinolone Acetonide Intravitreal Inserts Geographic Atrophy
DOC.detailed_description: Each patient receive sham injection one eye active treatment eye . The eye receive active treatment select base randomization schedule .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis bilateral GA secondary AMD ≥ 0.5 ≤ 7 MPS disc area Males nonpregnant females 55 year old old GA secondary condition AMD either eye History current CNV either eye need antiangiogenic therapy Glaucoma ocular hypertension ( IOP > 21 mmHg OR concurrent therapy screen IOPlowering agent ) either eye Treatment intravitreal , subtenon , periocular steroid within 6 month prior enrollment either eye Any change systemic steroid therapy within 3 month screen History vitrectomy either eye Any ocular surgery within 12 week screen either eye
